itunes:title: Episode 796 - The Death of New York with James Altucher
title: Episode 796 - The Death of New York with James Altucher
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: SERIOUSLY do NOT skip this episode, it's one of our best ever. Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by author and comedian James Altucher to discuss his new book ‘Skip the Line’, his article that claimed that COVID had New York City forever (and Je...
itunes:summary:
SERIOUSLY do NOT skip this episode, it's one of our best ever. Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by author and comedian James Altucher to discuss his new book ‘Skip the Line’, his article that claimed that COVID had New York City forever (and Jerry Seinfeld’s angry New York Times OpEd response to his article), how his checking account went from $15 million to $154 in one summer, how to keep your creative muscles as strong as possible, and how to teach your kids to be creative.

 

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
